item.title: Building a Local Search Engine for Our Memo Website
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our journey to develop a fully local search engine for our memo website has been an evolution. Initially, we relied on Algolia, a third-party search solution that provided excellent search capabilities, followed up with Modal to index and scrape our website.
